desc: Equestrians love our products! Innovative horse products for our equine athletes that consider horse anatomy and physiology providing increased performance and comfort : Hunter, Jumper, Eventing, Dressage, Pony, Western. Internationally patented girth design.

layout.text: The girth is as important for your horse as is the saddle. The Tapestry Comfort Girth can eliminate "girthy" behaviour, increase your horses' stride, allow for deeper breathing in your horse, and improve their form over fences. All because we put the elastic where they need it. No one else does and that's what sets us apart.
